nodes.text: Yinta Lake spaceport, located in the city of Yinta Lake, was the preeminent port on the Mid Rim planet Vulta. In 3653 BBY, the mercenary Vrath Xizor, who had been hired to prevent smuggler Zeerid Korr's shipment of engspice from reaching the planet Coruscant, ambushed Korr in the spaceport. However, Korr was accompanied by Jedi Knight Aryn Leneer, and together they were able to fend off Xizor's attack.
